name: Crostini with Goat Cheese, Sun-Dried Tomatoes, and Basil
author: Emily
summary: A quick appetizer or finger food for your dinner party or pot luck. You need to take the measurements with a grain of salt as it all depends on how thickly you slice your baguette.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (8 ounce) jar oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and cut into thirds
1 bunch fresh basil leaves, washed and dried
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Arrange baguette slices on a large rimmed baking sheet and brush with olive oil
Bake in the preheated oven until golden, 15 to 20 minutes
Let cool on the baking sheet, about 30 minutes
Spread soft goat sheet onto each baguette slice and top with a few sun-dried tomato pieces
